Reliable Service, Experienced Logistics & Absolute Solutions

Don't leave your freight to uncertainty. At Roney, we can haul your cold chain supply wherever, whenever. Were federally licensed, TWIC cardholders. That means we can get clearance to all shipping ports and railroad yards. There is nowhere we can't go to get the job done!

Cold Chain Supply Solutions For
South East Region And North East Region

Professional and experienced

We offer dedicated and experienced drivers who can your supply-chain needs.

Spotted Trailers

With Roney, you can have the freedom of loading and unloading at your convenience.

FTL and LTL Service

Whether your shipment is 100 to 5,000 lbs or 5,000 to 20,000 lbs we can deliver.

Any location in the U.S.

We service the full continental US territory. Including Canada and Mexico.

TWIC Card Holder

At Roney, we’re federally licensed to get clearance to all shipping ports and railroad yards in the United States.

Proof of delivery

The most critical tracking component is proof of delivery that is both accurate and instant. We provide that.

What We Do

A trucking company’s primary purpose is to transport full-truckloads of goods from one location to another. We do more than that.

Expedited shipping

We offer faster shipping for when you are in a bind and need quick turn-around on deliveries.

LTL Shipments

LTL Shipments, otherwise known as less-than-load, are cost-saving, eco-friendly options to save your company money.

Over The Road

We haul freight over long distances, across state lines and even national borders.

Hazmat Delivery

We haul hazardous materials across the country ranging from explosives to radioactive materials.

Cold-Chain

We specialize in hauling bulk, product under strict temperature control settings and frequent quality control checks.

Access To Rail-Road Yards

Clearance to all of the United States shipping ports and rail road yards.
